subject: HORSE RACING
KENTUCKY DERBY
lead_paragraph: Graham Motion still can't believe it. That's what winning the Kentucky Derby does to a trainer. ''It's still hard for me to think I won last year,'' said Motion, who saddled Animal Kingdom to that victory at Churchill Downs.
snippet: After the surprising victory last year with Animal Kingdom, a winning owner-trainer-jockey trio is aiming for a second straight Kentucky Derby title with another little-raced horse, Went the Day Well.
